Html:
I am configuring a WPF Ribbon Control (RibbonControlsLibrary.dll, Ver. 3.5.31016.1), and I would like to add a 'MyProgram Options' button and an 'Exit MyProgram' button to the body of the ApplicationMenu,Â  as is done in MS Office. In Office, these commands are not part of the menu, but are separate buttons (see screen shot).

I can't find any articles or blogs that show how to create these buttons. Can anyone provide a link, or the XAML needed to create these buttons? Thanks very much.

David Veeneman
Foresight Systems

It sounds like you gave up searching too soon.  You have to use the ApplicationMenu footer.  Here is a sample post.

http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=39406
